name: Ether (BearJerms)
description:
Controls: 

Z to throw the tile to the right of you.

X to replace the tile to the right of you. (THIS COSTS YOU 1 HP!!)

Arrow keys to move.

This is a small project made from a prototype I didn't like enough to fully pursue. I turned it into a small arcade game that might be fun to speedrun. It should be fairly bug free, but feel free to comment about any issues you find.

P.S.

You  can kill yourself by spam replacing the tile in front of you. This is intentional, to avoid being stuck in a fight. Instead you just get a game over.

Credits:

All music and sounds done by SketchyLogic.

I downloaded the music and sounds from OpenGameArt.org

Everything else was done by me.
